verses.verse: Hezekiah <S%H3169><s%> began to <S%H4427>reign<s%> when he was <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H29>Abijah<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, according to all that <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%>.

He in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%>, in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and repaired <S%H2388>them<s%>.
And he brought <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and gathered them <S%H622>together<s%> into the <S%H7339>broad<s%> place on the <S%H4217>east<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, Hear <S%H3881>me<s%>, ye Levites; now <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H6942>yourselves<s%>, and sanctify the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H5079>filthiness<s%> out of the holy <S%H6944>place<s%>.

For our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H4603>trespassed<s%>, and <S%H6213>done<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, and have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5437>him<s%>, and have turned away their <S%H6440>faces<s%> from the <S%H4908>habitation<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5414>turned<s%> their <S%H6203>backs<s%>.

Also they have shut <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%>, and put <S%H3518>out<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, and have not <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> nor <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place unto the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Wherefore the <S%H7110>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was upon <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and he hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them to be <S%H2189>tossed<s%> to and <S%H8047>fro<s%>, to be an astonishment, and a <S%H8322>hissing<s%>, as ye <S%H7200>see<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

For <S%H1><s%>, lo, our fathers have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> and our <S%H802>wives<s%> are in captivity for <S%H7628>this<s%>.

Now it is in my <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> may turn away from <S%H7725>us<s%>.

My <S%H1121>sons<s%>, be not now <S%H7952>negligent<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8334>him<s%>, to minister unto <S%H8334>him<s%>, and that ye should be his ministers, and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%>.

Then the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, <S%H4287>Mahath<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6022>Amasai<s%>, and <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>; and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, <S%H7027>Kish<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5660>Abdi<s%>, and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3094>Jehallelel<s%>; and of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%>, <S%H3098>Joah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2155>Zimmah<s%>, and <S%H5731>Eden<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3098>Joah<s%>;

and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%>, <S%H8113>Shimri<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeuel<s%>; and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> and <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%>;
and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman<s%>, <S%H3171>Jehuel<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>; and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>.

And they <S%H622>gathered<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H935>themselves<s%>, and went <S%H4687>in<s%>, according to the commandment of the <S%H4428>king<s%> by the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in unto the inner <S%H6441>part<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> <S%H3318>it<s%>, and brought out all the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> into the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6901>took<s%> <S%H3318>it<s%>, to carry it out <S%H2351>abroad<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron<s%>.

Now they <S%H2490>began<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%>, and on the <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they to the <S%H197>porch<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and they <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: and on the <S%H8337>sixteenth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> they made an <S%H3615>end<s%>.

Then they <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H6441>in<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> within the <S%H559>palace<s%>, and said, We have <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, with all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H7979>thereof<s%>, and the table of <S%H4635>showbread<s%>, with all the vessels <S%H3627>thereof<s%>.

Moreover all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, which <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> in his <S%H4438>reign<s%> did cast <S%H2186>away<s%> when he <S%H4604>trespassed<s%>, have we <S%H3559>prepared<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%>; <S%H6440>and<s%>, behold, they are before the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Then <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> arose <S%H7925>early<s%>, and <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6842>he<s%> - <S%H5795>goats<s%>, for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> for the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> and for the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> and for <S%H3063>Judah<s%>. And he <S%H559>commanded<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to <S%H5927>offer<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And they brought <S%H5066>near<s%> the <S%H8163>he<s%> - goats for the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>; and they <S%H5564>laid<s%> their hands upon <S%H3027>them<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H2398>them<s%>, and they made a sin-offering with their <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> that the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and the <S%H5930>sin-offering<s%> should be made for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%>, with <S%H5035>psalteries<s%>, and with <S%H3658>harps<s%>, according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2374>seer<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>; for the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> was <S%H3027>of<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5030>prophets<s%>.
And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> with the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>.
